short_summary: Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
full_summary:
### Competitive Solicitation for Hose, Air Breathing

#### Solicitation Number
W8485-237426/A

#### Solicitation Publication Date
March 20, 2023

#### Closing Date and Time
May 2, 2023 at 14:00:00 Eastern Time

#### Procurement Category
Goods and Services (GD)

#### Solicitation Description
The Department of National Defence is soliciting bids for the delivery of Air Breathing Hoses (GSIN: 4720) with the following specifications:

- Part Number: REDAR-A11385-01
- Quantity: 50 Units
- Unit of Issue: Each
- Delivery Date: CFSD Montreal, no later than March 15th, 2023

#### Selection Criteria
Unclear functions have been avoided to provide digitally compatible products,  deliver products that are easily extensible to the avoid recurring business systems problems in our customary banners.

#### Instructions to Bidders
Offers may be submitted electronically via the [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca) electronic procurement system. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Request for Proposal Terms and Conditions

- Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide
- Regions of Delivery: Quebec (excluding NCR)

### Contact Information

- Name: Bergeron, Debbie
- E-mail: [debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca](mailto:debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca)
- Address:
  Boul de la Carrière, 455
  Gatineau, QC J8Y 6V7

### Documents

Please download the supporting document for this solicitation from the [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca) electronic procurement system.

- **Bid Solicitation Document** (English): [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/20/f00a02cbfb66549c7d5a2e7e5234fdf7/w8485-237426a_bid_solicitation_en.pdf)
- **Bid Solicitation Document** (French): [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/20/b3bd003037e929ffe44db9946559f88e/w8485-237426a_bid_s
